NK036(chi)023:0: bla ma'i rim pa tshig don bcu pa zhes bya
NK036(chi)023:1: ba bzhugs so rgya gar skad du gu ru kra
NK036(chi)023:2: ma ma h+aa san+d+hi u pa de sha n+aa ma
NK036(chi)023:3: bod skad du bla ma'i rim pa rdzogs pa chen
NK036(chi)023:4: po gnad kyi man ngag ces bya ba bla ma
NK036(chi)023:5: dam pa rin po che rnams la phyag 'tshal lo
NK036(chi)023:6: // bla ma'i rim pa bstan pa la don bcu
NK036(chi)023:7: ste bla ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang bla ma'i
NK036(chi)023:8: rang bzhin bstan pa dang bla ma ji ltar bkur
NK036(chi)023:9: ba'irima pa dang gsol ba'i ji ltar btab pa dang
NK036(chi)023:10: de la byin rlabs 'byung bas yid ches bskyed pa'i
NK036(chi)023:11: mtshan nyid bstan pa dang bla ma'i bye brag bstan
NK036(chi)023:12: pa dang bla ma ji ltar mnyes par bya ba'i
NK036(chi)023:13: rim pa dang bla ma la log par bltas shing
NK036(chi)023:14: mnyes par ma byas pa'i nyes dmigs dang de la
NK036(chi)023:15: bshags pa'i tshad dang yon tan la dmigs nas bstan
NK036(chi)023:16: pa'i khyad par dang bcu'o de la dang po bla
NK036(chi)023:17: ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa la gnyis te rang bzhin
NK036(chi)023:18: gyi mtshan nyid dang brtags pa'i mtshan nyid do rang
NK036(chi)023:19: bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin gyi gzung 'dzin
NK036(chi)023:20: chung ba dang rnam rtog chung ba ci la'ang yangs
NK036(chi)023:21: pa lus ngag la lhod yod pa'o brtags pa'i mtshan
NK036(chi)023:22: nyid ni bkod pa chen po las mkhas shing bya
NK036(chi)023:23: ba dang bral ba chos nyid don ldan tshad phebs
NK036(chi)023:24: pa 'dod pa'i don la rmongs pa med gsang sngags
NK036(chi)023:25: bla ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs pas yang dag
NK036(chi)023:26: par brtags nas mkhas shing bya ba dang bral ba
NK036(chi)023:27: zhes pa bzhi ste yangs shing rgyud la mkhas pa
NK036(chi)023:28: dang goms shing gsang sngags kyi sgrub thabs la mkhas
NK036(chi)023:29: pa dang rtogs shing lta ba la mkhas pa dang
NK036(chi)023:30: nyams su blang zhing nyams myong la mkhas pa'o dang
NK036(chi)023:31: po yangs shing rgyud la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi
NK036(chi)023:32: rgyud ma lus pa'i don bla ma gong ma rnams
NK036(chi)023:33: las thugs legs par sbyangs pas slob ma la 'khrul
NK036(chi)023:34: pa med par ston shes pa de yang ras chod
NK036(chi)023:35: dang gzu lums la sogs pa'i tshul ma yin pa
NK036(chi)023:36: ston shes pa'o goms shing sgrub pa la mkhas pas
NK036(chi)023:37: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i don sde pas shes pa'o
NK036(chi)023:38: rtogs shing lta ba la mkhas pas spyir theg pa
NK036(chi)023:39: mtha' dag gi don la lta ba'i don shes pas
NK036(chi)023:40: gzhan gyi sgro 'dogs chod pa dang bye brag tu
NK036(chi)023:41: chos nyid mngon sum gyi don la mkhas pa yid
NK036(chi)023:42: dpyod tshig gi spyod pa las grol ba'o nyams su
NK036(chi)023:43: blangs shing nyams myong la mkhas pa ni rang gis
NK036(chi)023:44: nyams su blangs pas shes bya nang gi sgro 'dogs
NK036(chi)023:45: chod nyams myong la mkhas pas skal ldan gzhan gyi
NK036(chi)023:46: rgyud grol bar nus pa'o bya ba dang bral zhes
NK036(chi)023:47: pa ni de yang bla ma de 'jig rten bya
NK036(chi)023:48: ba dang bral nas ri khrod dam dgon pa brten
NK036(chi)023:49: cing 'khor mang po dang 'du 'dzi spangs pa ni
NK036(chi)023:50: chos nyid bya ba dang bral ba rgyud la brten
NK036(chi)023:51: pa'i rtags so chos nyid don dang ldan pas 'jig
NK036(chi)023:52: rten gyi rtsis gdab las 'das pa'o tshad phebs zhes
NK036(chi)023:53: pa chos tshig phyir ma song lag tu blang rgyu'i
NK036(chi)023:54: chos thams cad tshad la phebs pas nyams skyes pa
NK036(chi)023:55: dang 'dod pa'i don la rmongs pa med ces pa
NK036(chi)023:56: slob ma de gang 'dod pa'i chos kyi don la
NK036(chi)023:57: rmongs pa med par ston shes pa ni sngon sbyangs
NK036(chi)023:58: pa'i rtags yin no yang na gter chen po la
NK036(chi)023:59: longs spyod pa'i rtags so de ltar mtshan nyid lnga
NK036(chi)023:60: dang ldan na bla ma'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'o spyi
NK036(chi)023:61: don gnyis pa bla ma'i rang bzhin ni lus kyi
NK036(chi)023:62: spyod pa dal chags pa dang ngag gi spyod pa
NK036(chi)023:63: drang por smra ba dang sems kyi spyod pa ting
NK036(chi)023:64: nge 'dzin ma yengs pa'o de lta bu'i rang bzhin
NK036(chi)023:65: dang ldan na bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes
NK036(chi)023:66: bya'o spyi don gsum pa bla ma ji ltar bkur
NK036(chi)023:67: ba'i rim pa ni bla ma mthong ba'i tshe na
NK036(chi)023:68: mthong phyag 'tshal bas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams
NK036(chi)023:69: mngon du byed pa'i dgos pa yod bla ma la
NK036(chi)023:70: dus rtag tu man+dala phul bas byang chub sems dpa'i
NK036(chi)023:71: sa la spyod pa'o dus rtag tu lus gus pa
NK036(chi)023:72: dang bcas pas phyag btsal na 'khor los sgyur ba'i
NK036(chi)023:73: rgyal po'i longs spyod dang mnyam mo dus rgyun du
NK036(chi)023:74: bskor ba byas na 'gro ba thams cad byams shing
NK036(chi)023:75: kun gyis legs par ster bar 'gyur ro dus rtag
NK036(chi)023:76: tu dril phyis byas na rdo rje'i mig dang ldan
NK036(chi)023:77: par 'gyur ro dri zhim po'i thig le byas na
NK036(chi)023:78: bde ba 'ba' zhig la longs spyod do bla ma
NK036(chi)023:79: la rang gi lus phul te bla ma'i bya ba
NK036(chi)023:80: la mkhas par byas na 'gro ba thams cad bran
NK036(chi)023:81: du khol bar 'gyur ro ngag gi bstod pa sna
NK036(chi)023:82: tshogs pa'i bstod na dbyangs kyi snyan pas sangs rgyas
NK036(chi)023:83: kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ro
NK036(chi)023:84: bla ma la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa lan
NK036(chi)023:85: cig byas na tshe 'di la bya ba rnams legs
NK036(chi)023:86: par 'grub cing ma 'ongs dus na stong 'khor los
NK036(chi)023:87: sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro lan gnyis
NK036(chi)023:88: byas na tshe 'di la nyes pa spang zhing ma
NK036(chi)023:89: 'ongs pa'i dus na stong sa 'dzin gyi rgyal por
NK036(chi)023:90: 'gyur ro lan gsum byas na tshe 'di la kun
NK036(chi)023:91: gyis snyan pa sgrog cing mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur
NK036(chi)023:92: ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mkha' spyod kyi
NK036(chi)023:93: sid+d+hi thob par 'gyur ro lan bdun byas na 'di
NK036(chi)023:94: nyid la don ji ltar bsams pa ltar 'grub la
NK036(chi)023:95: 'di nas shi 'phos ma thag tu rig 'dzin rgyal
NK036(chi)023:96: por gyur nas 'gro ba rnams kyi kha lo gyen
NK036(chi)023:97: la bsgyur ba'o rang gi lo grangs zhig byas na
NK036(chi)023:98: 'di nyid la tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin grub
NK036(chi)023:99: pas ji srid gnas pa bzhin du gnas pa dang
NK036(chi)023:100: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa sel
NK036(chi)023:101: zhing rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba btul nas
NK036(chi)023:102: tha ma zag bcas mi snang bar sangs rgya ba
NK036(chi)023:103: la the tshom med do yang rang gi bla ma
NK036(chi)023:104: la bdun rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas ras yug
NK036(chi)023:105: cig tsam phul bas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
NK036(chi)023:106: nor bu'i bang mdzod la longs spyod par 'gyur ro
NK036(chi)023:107: de ltar yang bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyud
NK036(chi)023:108: las nam mkha' gang ba'i sangs rgyas la sna tshogs
NK036(chi)023:109: rin chen spras pa yis stong gsum gang ba phul
NK036(chi)023:110: gyur bas bla ma'i ba spu nyag re la mar
NK036(chi)023:111: gyi thig pa gcig byugs pa brgya phrag mang po'i
NK036(chi)023:112: char mi 'bod tha ma spyod lam du ma'i sgo
NK036(chi)023:113: nas bla ma mnyes par byas te bla ma bzhengs
NK036(chi)023:114: pa'i dus su langs pa dang thal mo sbyar ba
NK036(chi)023:115: dang bzhugs pa'i dus su stan btab pa dang man+dala
NK036(chi)023:116: phul ba dang rang bla ma'i drung du sbrid pa
NK036(chi)023:117: lu ba'i dus su kha la lag pas dgab pa
NK036(chi)023:118: dang mdor na bag ma gsar pa'i tshul du byas
NK036(chi)023:119: pas sprul pa'i zhing khams su dbugs 'byin par 'gyur
NK036(chi)023:120: ro de yang bla ma de rang la gces pa'i
NK036(chi)023:121: bu ltar yid la khur bas byin rlabs 'dod 'jo'i
NK036(chi)023:122: ba ltar 'byung ba dang dus kyi lto bzhin du
NK036(chi)023:123: yid la byas pas byin rlabs bkres skom pa la
NK036(chi)023:124: bza' btung zos 'thungs pa ltar 'byung ba dang nad
NK036(chi)023:125: pas sman pa brten pa ltar g.yeng ba med par
NK036(chi)023:126: khur bas byin rlabs rtag tu bde ba la longs
NK036(chi)023:127: spyod pa'o de bzhin 'jigs sar lam gyi skyel ma
NK036(chi)023:128: bzhin dang mun khang gi sgron ma bzhin dang yid
NK036(chi)023:129: bzhin nor bu bzhin du thabs sna tshogs kyi bla
NK036(chi)023:130: ma brten par bya'o spyi don bzhi pa gsol ba
NK036(chi)023:131: ji ltar gdab pa ni bkod pa yid bzhin nor
NK036(chi)023:132: bu rin po che 'byung ba'i rgyud las bla ma
NK036(chi)023:133: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnyen
NK036(chi)023:134: gcig po 'gro ba mgon med rnams kyi skyabs thar
NK036(chi)023:135: pa'i lam skas chen po ste ma rig sel ba'i
NK036(chi)023:136: sgron me la mun pa'i tshogs bdag skyabs su mchi
NK036(chi)023:137: 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu bying ba skyabs
NK036(chi)023:138: med bdag la skyobs dug gsum me yis brlan bral
NK036(chi)023:139: bas sdug bsngal skam la gnas pa la thugs rje'i
NK036(chi)023:140: chu rgyun bdag la phog rtsub 'gyur dmyal ba'i me
NK036(chi)023:141: chen 'bar rang byung brlan gyis bsil bar mdzod bla
NK036(chi)023:142: ma rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha lha yi lha khyod
NK036(chi)023:143: phyag 'tshal lo bdag ni bskal pa thog ma nas
NK036(chi)023:144: lus kyis bcings pa'i sems can dag 'byung ba'i snod
NK036(chi)023:145: dang bral gyur la 'od gsal dri med lus ldan
NK036(chi)023:146: shog smra ba ngag gis bcings pa la 'khrul pa'i
NK036(chi)023:147: gtam rgyud zungs zad nas brjod du med pa'i don
NK036(chi)023:148: ldan shog 'gyur med sems kyi rtog pas bcings mi
NK036(chi)023:149: rtog gsal ba'i snang mthong nas bsam 'das 'phro 'du
NK036(chi)023:150: chad par shog de ltar lus ngag yid gsum la
NK036(chi)023:151: byin gyis brlabs nas sku gsum gyi 'bras bu tshad
NK036(chi)023:152: la phebs par mdzod ces gsungs pas de ltar nyin
NK036(chi)023:153: lan gsum mtshan lan gsum gsol ba btab pas sku
NK036(chi)023:154: gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs ba rjod kyis mi langs
NK036(chi)023:155: pa 'byung ba ni rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu
NK036(chi)023:156: 'og zla ba steng nyi ma de gnyis ga'u kha
NK036(chi)023:157: sbyar ba lta bu'i nang na a yod pa las
NK036(chi)023:158: de las 'od dpag tu med pa 'phros pas rang
NK036(chi)023:159: gi bla ma spyi bo'i gtsug tu spyan drangs te
NK036(chi)023:160: bla ma skyil krung phyed pas gdan stengs su bzhugs
NK036(chi)023:161: pa la gsol ba btab pas bla ma bde ba'i
NK036(chi)023:162: ngo bor zhu nas zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong las
NK036(chi)023:163: byang sems kyi thig le sran ma'i ga'u tsam yungs
NK036(chi)023:164: 'bru tsam phram phram byung ste spyi bor thim pas
NK036(chi)023:165: lus kyi sdig pa dag nas lus bde ba'i ngo
NK036(chi)023:166: bor zhu de nas mgrin par slebs pas lus ngag
NK036(chi)023:167: yid gsum bde ba'i ngo bor zhu nas bde ba
NK036(chi)023:168: rgya chen por 'phel ba'i gnas pa la blo yi
NK036(chi)023:169: sems gnas par bya'o 'di dus na bdag ji bzhin
NK036(chi)023:170: sems can thams cad kyang de ltar gyur pa la
NK036(chi)023:171: blo gnas par bya'o de ltar nyin lan gsum dang
NK036(chi)023:172: mtshan lan gsum byas nas bla ma'i byin rlabs dngos
NK036(chi)023:173: su 'byung ba la the tshom med do de ltar
NK036(chi)023:174: 'jig rten 'dir yang legs pa thams cad 'grub cing
NK036(chi)023:175: nyes pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro ma 'ongs
NK036(chi)023:176: pa'i dus na tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas sku gnyis 'grub
NK036(chi)023:177: pa'o rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyud las lha
NK036(chi)023:178: sku 'bum phrag bsgoms pa bas bla ma'i sku bsgoms
NK036(chi)023:179: bsod nams 'phags des na bla ma'i sku 'di rin
NK036(chi)023:180: thang che rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i sngon 'gro dam pa'o
NK036(chi)023:181: zhes pa'o yang bkod pa chen po las yi dam
NK036(chi)023:182: lha yi sku bsgoms kyang bla ma'i sku la dmigs
NK036(chi)023:183: pa ma log na brgya phrag stong gi char yang
NK036(chi)023:184: mi 'agro'o bsnyen sgrub bzlas pa sa ya bas bla
NK036(chi)023:185: ma'i gsol tshig lan gsum brjod pa ni nus pa
NK036(chi)023:186: 'bum phrag char yang mi phod do rdzogs pa'i rim
NK036(chi)023:187: pa bskal pa'i bar du yang 'du 'dzi spangs nas
NK036(chi)023:188: bsgoms pa bas bla ma rang sems dkyil du shar
NK036(chi)023:189: ba tsam stong phrag nyi shu char yang mi phod
NK036(chi)023:190: do des na bla ma bsgoms dang bstod dang bsam
NK036(chi)023:191: pa yis sangs rgyas 'bras bu gcig char 'grub par
NK036(chi)023:192: nges zhes so spyi don lnga pa byin rlabs 'byung
NK036(chi)023:193: bas yid ches bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni
NK036(chi)023:194: bla ma brten pas byin rlabs 'byung byin rlabs 'byung
NK036(chi)023:195: bas bla ma la gdung ba 'di ltar skye ste
NK036(chi)023:196: skyes bu me 'obs su tshud pa'i sdug bsngal las
NK036(chi)023:197: grol bar 'dod pa ltar bla ma yid la 'dod
NK036(chi)023:198: pa dang rgya mtsho'i gling la gru pa 'dod pa
NK036(chi)023:199: ltar bla ma yid la 'dod pa dang rgyal po'i
NK036(chi)023:200: btson du tshud pa 'don par 'dod pa ltar bla
NK036(chi)023:201: ma yid la 'dod pa dang gshed ma'i khung du
NK036(chi)023:202: tshud pa las thar par 'dod pa ltar bla ma
NK036(chi)023:203: yid la 'dod pa'o de'i rtags su 'jig rten gyi
NK036(chi)023:204: zang zing dang a cang ches te rang gi mgo
NK036(chi)023:205: dang yan lag dang lus rnams kyang bla ma la
NK036(chi)023:206: gtong bar nus pa dag 'byung ngo rdo rje bkod
NK036(chi)023:207: pa'i rgyud las kyang rgyu mtsho'i gling dang me chen
NK036(chi)023:208: 'obs rgyal po'i btson rar tshud pas kyang bla ma
NK036(chi)023:209: dran na grol bar nges zhes so spyi don drug
NK036(chi)023:210: pa bla ma'i bye brag bstan pa ni bla ma
NK036(chi)023:211: dang slob dpon gnyis te slob dpon la yang gnyis
NK036(chi)023:212: 'jig rten pa'i slob dpon dang 'das pa'i slob dpon
NK036(chi)023:213: no 'jig rten pa'i slob dpon ming du btags pa
NK036(chi)023:214: de sman dang rtsis dang bzo dang zas nor 'tshol
NK036(chi)023:215: ba'i yon tan slob pa'i slob dpon no 'das pa
NK036(chi)023:216: yang dag pa'i slob dpon la drug ste spyi'i slob
NK036(chi)023:217: dpon yul mi'i spyi'i slob dpon du khur ba'o sngags
NK036(chi)023:218: pa spyi'i slob dpon du khur ba dang gcig yin
NK036(chi)023:219: 'dren pa'i slob dpon chos sgor 'dzud pa de yin
NK036(chi)023:220: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon ni dbang bskur zhing
NK036(chi)023:221: dam tshig dang sdom pa 'bogs pa'o nyams chag skong
NK036(chi)023:222: ba'i slob dpon ni rang dam tshig gi sel byung
NK036(chi)023:223: ba de la skong ba zhus pa dang tshe dbang
NK036(chi)023:224: bskur nas rang la skyob par byed pa'o shes rgyud
NK036(chi)023:225: grol ba'i slob dpon ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams slob
NK036(chi)023:226: pa'o man ngag lung gi slob dpon ni lung 'bogs
NK036(chi)023:227: pa dang man ngag ston pa'o de ltar slob dpon
NK036(chi)023:228: drug po de yang dam tshig sa ma ya bkod
NK036(chi)023:229: pa'i rgyud las spyi dang 'dren dang nyams chag skong
NK036(chi)023:230: shes rgyud grol dang dam tshig dbang man ngag lung
NK036(chi)023:231: gi slob dpon la khu bo pha dang ma dang
NK036(chi)023:232: mig snying bas lhag pa'i tshul blta ste sgo gsum
NK036(chi)023:233: zol zog sgyu med pas rab tu gces dang yid
NK036(chi)023:234: 'thad dbul ces so bla ma la gnyis te rtsa
NK036(chi)023:235: ba'i bla ba dang yan lag gi bla ma'o rtsa
NK036(chi)023:236: ba'i bla ma ni bzhi dang ldan te dbang bskur
NK036(chi)023:237: rgyud bshad lung 'bogs man ngag bstan ces pas rang
NK036(chi)023:238: yang de'i chos nyams su len pa dang bzhi 'dzom
NK036(chi)023:239: na rtsa ba'i bla ma'o yan lag gi bla ma
NK036(chi)023:240: ni gcig ldan gnyis ldan gsum ldan bzhi la sogs
NK036(chi)023:241: pa'o de yang rtsa ba'i bla ma dang yan lag
NK036(chi)023:242: gi bla ma tshogs bsags pa'i zhing khyad par che
NK036(chi)023:243: ste stobs bdun 'gyur du yod pas gcig ldan pas
NK036(chi)023:244: gnyis ldan che de bdun bas gsum ldan de gsum
NK036(chi)023:245: ka 'bu ma phrag bdun la dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK036(chi)023:246: bskyed pa bas rtsa ba'i bla ma gcig po la
NK036(chi)023:247: tshogs bsags pa bsod nams che'o he ru ka mngon
NK036(chi)023:248: par 'byung ba'i rgyud las yan lag bla ma 'bum
NK036(chi)023:249: phrag bdun gser ni rang lus tsam mchod kyang rtsa
NK036(chi)023:250: ba'i bla ma srang gcig gis legs par mchod pa'i
NK036(chi)023:251: dngos grub ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang brjod par dka'
NK036(chi)023:252: zhes so yang kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud las sangs
NK036(chi)023:253: rgyas gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed gdugs dang rgyal
NK036(chi)023:254: mtshan la sogs pas khyad par gyis mchod bkur byas
NK036(chi)023:255: pas bla ma'i ba spu'i khung gcig la mchod par
NK036(chi)023:256: byas pas bsod nams che zhes so spyi don bdun
NK036(chi)023:257: pa ji ltar mnyes par bya ba ni gang zag
NK036(chi)023:258: rab kyis ji ltar mnyes par bya ba dang 'bring
NK036(chi)023:259: gis ji ltar mnyes par bya ba dang tha mas
NK036(chi)023:260: ji ltar mnyes par bya ba'o de la rab kyis
NK036(chi)023:261: mnyes par bya ba la bzhi ste dad pas mnyes
NK036(chi)023:262: par bya ba dang shes rab kyis mnyes par bya
NK036(chi)023:263: ba dang brtson 'grus kyis mnyes par bya ba dang
NK036(chi)023:264: ting nge 'a dzin gyis mnyes par bya ba'o de
NK036(chi)023:265: la dad pas mnyes par bya ba ni mgo mjug
NK036(chi)023:266: thams cad du 'pho 'gyur dang skyo ngal med pa'o
NK036(chi)023:267: de ltar yang dpal 'khor lo chub pa rol pa'i
NK036(chi)023:268: rgyud las yon tan nang nas dad pa mchog stong
NK036(chi)023:269: gsum gang ba'i sangs rgyas la mchod pas stong gsum
NK036(chi)023:270: bkang mchod pas 'di yi mchod pa'i char ma phod
NK036(chi)023:271: ces so shes rab kyis mnyes par bya ba ni
NK036(chi)023:272: bla ma'i gsung sgros lhag chad med par ston shes
NK036(chi)023:273: pa ste bla ma'i bstan pa'i srol ma nyams par
NK036(chi)023:274: byed pa'o de ltar yang 'khor lo chub pa rol
NK036(chi)023:275: pa las shes rab mchog gis bla ma la rang
NK036(chi)023:276: gis mnyes par byas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis
NK036(chi)023:277: gsung ba'i chos bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang
NK036(chi)023:278: su yis bklags shing brjod pa las bsod nams 'bum
NK036(chi)023:279: phrag bsam yas so zhes so brtson 'grus kyis mnyes
NK036(chi)023:280: par bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi bya ba spangs
NK036(chi)023:281: nas ri khrod la sogs par bsgrubs pas lus ngag
NK036(chi)023:282: gi rtags mang po ston nas sems can lam la
NK036(chi)023:283: 'jug par 'gyur par bla ma mnyes pa'o de yang
NK036(chi)023:284: chub pa rol pa las bskyed rim bskal pa gsum
NK036(chi)023:285: bsgoms pas bla ma mnyes pa'i bsod nams ni bdag
NK036(chi)023:286: gis spobs pa ma yin no zhes so ting nge
NK036(chi)023:287: 'dzin gyis mnyes par bya ba ni /
NK036(chi)023:288: bar 'dir ting nge 'a dzin gyis mnyes par bya
NK036(chi)023:289: tshul chad 'dug gang zag 'bring rnams kyis mnyes par
NK036(chi)023:290: bya ba ni lus kyis mnyes par bya ba ste
NK036(chi)023:291: bla ma'i las dang bya ba rnams byas la mnyes
NK036(chi)023:292: par bya ba dang srog gi mel tshes mnyes par
NK036(chi)023:293: bya ba dang tshe yi bar gcod me dang chu
NK036(chi)023:294: dang gzhan yang rgyal po'i bar chad 'byung ba'i dus
NK036(chi)023:295: na bdag gis bla ma'i dod por 'gro nus pa
NK036(chi)023:296: dang mi gzhan gyis bla ma'i sku la bar chad
NK036(chi)023:297: byed na bdag gis de'i srog sngar gcod nus pa
NK036(chi)023:298: dang don gyi bdag po bla ma'i don du srog
NK036(chi)023:299: gtong nus pa'o de yang dpal bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i
NK036(chi)023:300: rgyud las gal te bla ma la gnod pa'i ma
NK036(chi)023:301: rungs sems kyis bcoms pa la bdag nyid kyis ni
NK036(chi)023:302: gsad bya ni sems can 'bum gyi srog bton pas
NK036(chi)023:303: bsod nams 'di yi char mi phod de yi phyir
NK036(chi)023:304: na bsod nams zhes dug gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK036(chi)023:305: kyis lung du bstan pa kho na'o bla ma'i bya
NK036(chi)023:306: ba rdzogs byas na 'di yang de dang mnyam pa'o
NK036(chi)023:307: zhes so gang zag tha mas bla ma ji ltar
NK036(chi)023:308: mnyes par bya ba ni rdzas dang longs spyod kyis
NK036(chi)023:309: mnyes par bya ba dang rgyal srid 'khor rnams phul
NK036(chi)023:310: nas mnyes par bya ba dang 'khor gsum yongs su
NK036(chi)023:311: dag par byas te ci yod pas mnyes par bya
NK036(chi)023:312: ba'o don gyi ci yang rung ba'i thabs sna tshogs
NK036(chi)023:313: kyis mnyes par bya ba'o de yang bkod pa chen
NK036(chi)023:314: po'i rgyud las che dang chung ba'i bye brag gang
NK036(chi)023:315: bla ma mnyes par gyur pa yis bsod nams brjod
NK036(chi)023:316: pa shin tu dka' zhes pas bla ma ci dang
NK036(chi)023:317: ci'i sgo nas mnyes par bya ba'o spyi don brgyad
NK036(chi)023:318: pa bla ma la log par bltas pa dang brnyas
NK036(chi)023:319: par byas pa'i nyes dmigs ni brjod kyis mi lang
NK036(chi)023:320: ngo gzhan dag lta ci smos te rmi lam du
NK036(chi)023:321: bla ma la brnyas pa byas pa tsam la yang
NK036(chi)023:322: 'di tsam 'byung ste dam tshig sa ma y+aa bkod
NK036(chi)023:323: pa'i rgyud las rmi lam dus na lus ngag yid
NK036(chi)023:324: gal te rdo rje slob dpon la nyes pa phra
NK036(chi)023:325: mo tsam byas na khyi yi skye ba brgyar blang
NK036(chi)023:326: nas sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur de nas
NK036(chi)023:327: sems can dmyal ba yi tsha grang gnyis ka'i sdug
NK036(chi)023:328: bsngal nyid nyams su myong ba kho na'o zhes so
NK036(chi)023:329: rmi lam du mi dad pa'am mi gus pa'am mi
NK036(chi)023:330: mos pa skyes pa tsam la nyes pa de tsam
NK036(chi)023:331: yod na dngos su byas nas brjod kyis mi lang
NK036(chi)023:332: ngo de yang mchod rten mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud
NK036(chi)023:333: las slob dpon sku la brnyas pa na chos sku
NK036(chi)023:334: bshig pas sdig pa che bla ma'i grib ma 'gong
NK036(chi)023:335: byas na sangs rgyas sku bcom sdig pa che bla
NK036(chi)023:336: ma'i gsung la sgros btags na lce yi dbang po
NK036(chi)023:337: brgyad par 'gyur bla ma'i gsung la skur btab na
NK036(chi)023:338: dam pa'i chos dang rtag tu bral bla ma'i thugs
NK036(chi)023:339: la smad pa na rang gi sgron ma rang gsod
NK036(chi)023:340: 'dra zhes so gal te bla ma la lus kyi
NK036(chi)023:341: sgo nas brnyas pa byas pa'am nyes par byas na
NK036(chi)023:342: shi 'phos ma thag tu rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro
NK036(chi)023:343: ngag gi nyes par byas na gnod sbyin gyi lus
NK036(chi)023:344: blangs nas de nas rdo rje'i dmyal ba'i gnas su
NK036(chi)023:345: 'gyur ro sems kyi sgo nas nyes pa byas na
NK036(chi)023:346: tshe gsum gyi 'og tu sems kyi snang ba duhkha
NK036(chi)023:347: ru 'khrul nas 'gro ba nges so de yang spyan
NK036(chi)023:348: ras gzigs snying rje phur pa'i rgyud las slob dpon
NK036(chi)023:349: las ni dngos grub thob gal te de la brnyas
NK036(chi)023:350: byed na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu 'thob gal
NK036(chi)023:351: te de nas thar na yang bskal ba bye ba
NK036(chi)023:352: brgya stong du dam chos ming yang mi thos so
NK036(chi)023:353: zhes so rdo rje thig le 'byung ba'i rgyud las
NK036(chi)023:354: dngos grub 'byung ba'i don du ni rtag tu slob
NK036(chi)023:355: dpon brten par bya des ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu
NK036(chi)023:356: ster de la brnyas na sdug bsngal thogs zhes so
NK036(chi)023:357: yang bla ma smad pa'i nyes pa ni sgyu 'phrul
NK036(chi)023:358: d+r+wa ba'i rgyud las bla ma la ni smod pa
NK036(chi)023:359: dang thugs dkrugs pa yi nyes pas ni phyi yi
NK036(chi)023:360: rgya mtsho chen po la chu de skra yis gtor
NK036(chi)023:361: nus pa de yis tshad du sdug bsngal myang rdo
NK036(chi)023:362: rje dmyal bar grags pa yin ces so rdo rje
NK036(chi)023:363: mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las slob dpon smad par mi bya
NK036(chi)023:364: ste 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra slob dpon
NK036(chi)023:365: la ni gang smod pa tshe 'di nyid la sdug
NK036(chi)023:366: bsngal 'byung rims dang drug dang dbyig dug dang d+aak+ki
NK036(chi)023:367: rnams kyis gtses pa dang gdon dang log 'dren gtum
NK036(chi)023:368: po yis bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung zhes
NK036(chi)023:369: so gzhan yang bla ma'i gos chas la sogs dang
NK036(chi)023:370: sku yi grib ma la mi 'gong yum la mi
NK036(chi)023:371: spyad bla ma la co 'dri bar mi bya'o de
NK036(chi)023:372: skad du yang badz+ra d+aak+ki'i rgyud las slob dpon gyi
NK036(chi)023:373: ni mal stan dang lhwam dang gdugs dang na bza'
NK036(chi)023:374: sogs mnyes pa'i btsun mo longs spyod dang grib ma
NK036(chi)023:375: 'gong bar mi bya zhing co 'dri bar ni mi
NK036(chi)023:376: bya zhing gal te byas na dus kun tu de
NK036(chi)023:377: ni kun tu gzir 'gyur zhing don nyams legs pa
NK036(chi)023:378: ring du spyad ces so spyi don dgu pa nyes
NK036(chi)023:379: pa byas nas bshags pa'i tshad bstan pa ni nyes
NK036(chi)023:380: pa lan gnyis nas bzhi dang bcu la sogs rnams
NK036(chi)023:381: bshags par byas pas 'dag la rang gi lo grangs
NK036(chi)023:382: tsam las 'das na ni bshags pas mi 'dag gi
NK036(chi)023:383: de ltar yang sa ma y+aa bkod pa las gal
NK036(chi)023:384: te bla ma brnyas pa'i mis lan grangs bdun nam
NK036(chi)023:385: bcu dag la 'gyod pa byas pas bshags pas 'byongs
NK036(chi)023:386: rang lo 'das nas bshags pa'i yul rdo rje sems
NK036(chi)023:387: dpas ma gnang ngo zhes gsungs so de yang dus
NK036(chi)023:388: thams cad du bla ma'i skyon dor zhing yon tan
NK036(chi)023:389: ci 'dug pa la bsam zhing bla ma brten pas
NK036(chi)023:390: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i don 'grub par
NK036(chi)023:391: nges so de yang thal 'gyur gyi le'u dang po
NK036(chi)023:392: nas mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'i bla ma ni yon tan
NK036(chi)023:393: kun gyi 'byung gnas yin rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzhi
NK036(chi)023:394: 'dzin pa'o zhes so spyi don bcu pa yon tan
NK036(chi)023:395: la dmigs nas dus thams cad du bla ma brten
NK036(chi)023:396: pa la yon tan ji ltar 'byung bar bstan pa
NK036(chi)023:397: ni yang thal 'gyur las brten pa de la yon
NK036(chi)023:398: tan ni dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin nor 'dod
NK036(chi)023:399: 'jo'i ba dang 'dra ba las yon tan dpag tu
NK036(chi)023:400: med pa thob de la dmigs te bla ma brten
NK036(chi)023:401: 'khor ba'i g.yul las bzlog phyir ro zhes gsungs so
NK036(chi)023:402: der ma zad thun mong gi sid+d+hi yang bla ma
NK036(chi)023:403: mnyes pa las 'byung ngo de skad du yang dam
NK036(chi)023:404: tshig chen po mchog gi rgyud las dngos grub 'dod
NK036(chi)023:405: pa'i dad pa can dngos grub bla ma mnyes las
NK036(chi)023:406: 'byung zhes so gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad spangs
NK036(chi)023:407: la bla ma mchod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go
NK036(chi)023:408: 'phang chen po yang 'thob rdo rje sems dpa' mchod
NK036(chi)023:409: pa yang yin bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dus
NK036(chi)023:410: gcig la bsags chos phyogs kyi dka' thub thams cad
NK036(chi)023:411: kyang des brten cing spyad pa yin te de bas
NK036(chi)023:412: bya ba che bzhag chung bshol la bla ma ji
NK036(chi)023:413: ltar mnyes pa'i thabs la 'bad par bya'o de skad
NK036(chi)023:414: du yang dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud las mchod
NK036(chi)023:415: pa thams cad yongs spangs la bla ma'i mchod pa
NK036(chi)023:416: yang dag brtsam de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i
NK036(chi)023:417: ye shes mchog de thob par 'gyur bla med mdzad
NK036(chi)023:418: pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchog
NK036(chi)023:419: gi de yi bsod nams ma bsags shing dka' thub
NK036(chi)023:420: ma brten ci zhig yod ces so yang gsang sngags
NK036(chi)023:421: kyi bla ma rnam 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
NK036(chi)023:422: de mchod cing mnyes par byas na phyogs bcu dus
NK036(chi)023:423: gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang des mchod dkyil
NK036(chi)023:424: 'khor chen po thams cad kyang des mchod nye ba'i
NK036(chi)023:425: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang des mchod nye ba'i dkyil
NK036(chi)023:426: 'khor zhes kyang bya ste rang gi yi dam lha
NK036(chi)023:427: mnyes pa smos ci dgos thun mong gi nyes pa
NK036(chi)023:428: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa nyams pa dang mi
NK036(chi)023:429: dge ba bcu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa
NK036(chi)023:430: dang khyad par gyis nyes pa gsang sngags kyi dam
NK036(chi)023:431: tshig nyams pa yang 'dag par 'gyur ro de skad
NK036(chi)023:432: du yang rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i
NK036(chi)023:433: rtsa ba'i rgyud las dbang phyug longs spyod lnga mchod
NK036(chi)023:434: na / dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin nye
NK036(chi)023:435: ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos nyes pa thams cad
NK036(chi)023:436: dag par 'gyur zhes so mdor na bla ma brten
NK036(chi)023:437: cing mchod na yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo
NK036(chi)023:438: thugs kyi rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las de
NK036(chi)023:439: bzhin gshegs pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed la
NK036(chi)023:440: mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa bas bla ma'i
NK036(chi)023:441: ba spu'i bu ga gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa'am
NK036(chi)023:442: ba spu'i bu ga gcig tsam mnyes par byas nas
NK036(chi)023:443: bsod nams che'o zhes so zab 'dus don 'dril spyi
NK036(chi)023:444: don bcu pa zhes bya ba bla ma sgrub pa'i
NK036(chi)023:445: rim pa skal ldan gyi don du sprul pa po
NK036(chi)023:446: dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so sngags kyi
NK036(chi)023:447: srung ma e ma ka tis bka' 'di'i bya ra
NK036(chi)023:448: gyis shig skal ldan dang 'phrad pa'i dus su lung
NK036(chi)023:449: khrol cig stong grogs gyis la dngos grub byin cig
NK036(chi)023:450: snod min gyi lag tu shor ra re srungs shig
NK036(chi)023:451: sa ma y+aa sa ma y+aa rgya rgya rgya gu
